content: PS 300 Ferroscan system Concrete detector for rebar localization, depth measurement and size estimation in structural analysis ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Concrete scanners and sensors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Integrated display provides rebar layout visuals in top view and sectional view for on-the-spot structural analysis Smart algorithm helps accurate depth measurements for rebar Wide sensor area enables quick and easy scan over large areas Record scan data for documentation and structural analysis Applications Verification and analysis for 1st layer rebar Checking concrete cover over large areas for structural repair work Building acceptance inspections and quality control Generation of structural assessment reports including statistics and visual presentation in 2D/3D views of areas ### TECHNICAL DATA: Max. detection depth for object localization: 8 in Accuracy of depth indication: 1% +/-3mm Localization accuracy: 1% +/-3mm mm Technical Data | Max. detection depth for object localization | 8 in | 1 | Accuracy of depth indication | 1% +/-3mm | 2 | Localization accuracy | 1% +/-3mm mm | 3 | Minimum distance between two neighbouring objects | 1.18 in | Data memory (scanner) | 200 scans | Working temperature range | 14 - 122 Â°F | Weight with batteries | 4.5 lb | Performance and accuracy can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. | Performance and accuracy can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. | Performance and accuracy can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. ### ITEMS- 3647685 - PS 1000 System+Ferroscan+PX10 Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PS 300 (wifi) Ferroscan - 5x PSA 13 (in, 600x600) Reference grid - 1x Hand strap - 1x PUA 90 Concrete adhesive tape - 1x PUA 70 Marker pen - 1x PS 300 Tool case - 1x PX 10 R Receiver - 1x PX 10 T Transmitter - 1x PUA 91 Adhesive putty - 2x Hand strap - 2x 9V Block Battery alkaline - 1x PXA 70 Slope adapter - 1x PUA 70 Marker pen - 1x PX 10 Tool case assy - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x POA 134 Battery charger - 1x PLC 600 Controller - 1x POA 41 Battery - 1x USA/CND Supply cord - 1x Sleeve - 1x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x PSA 200 SW Detection field - 1x PS 1000 FCC Registration Document - 1x PS1000 System Instruction Sheet - 1x OPERATOR TRAINING PS-300 E-LEARNING-TM - 1x OPERATOR TRAINING PS-1000 E-LEARNING-TM - 3636992 - PS 1000 X-Scan + PS 300 System - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PS 300 (wifi) Ferroscan - 5x PSA 13 (in, 600x600) Reference grid - 1x Hand strap - 1x PUA 90 Concrete adhesive tape - 1x PUA 70 Marker pen - 1x PS 300 Tool case - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - 1x PS 1000 FCC Registration Document - 1x PS1000 System Instruction Sheet - 1x OPERATOR TRAINING PS-300 E-LEARNING-TM - 1x OPERATOR TRAINING PS-1000 E-LEARNING-TM - 3636991 - Ferroscan PS 300 kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PS 300 (wifi) Ferroscan - 5x PSA 13 (in, 600x600) Reference grid - 1x Hand strap - 1x PUA 90 Concrete adhesive tape - 1x PUA 70 Marker pen - 1x PS 300 Tool case - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 2x Battery pack B 12-30 Li-ion - 1x OPERATOR TRAINING PS-300 E-LEARNING-TM
